home.title: Advanced Universal Ventures
home.subtitle: Driving innovation through cutting-edge SaaS solutions, elite tennis education, and compelling digital content creation.
home.whatWeDoDesc: We offer comprehensive solutions across technology, education, and media
home.saasDesc: Custom mobile and web applications focused on health, fitness, and lifestyle enhancement.
home.tennisDesc: Expert consulting services for student-athletes pursuing NCAA tennis opportunities.
home.contentDesc: Engaging social media content by Hanyu (Mason) Liu, connecting with audiences worldwide.
home.joinDesc: Be part of an innovative team shaping the future of technology and education.
home.aboutDesc1: Based in Maryland, USA, Advanced Universal Ventures, LLC is a forward-thinking company dedicated to excellence across multiple domains. We combine technological innovation with educational expertise and creative content to deliver exceptional value to our clients and partners.
home.aboutDesc2: Our mission is to empower individuals and organizations through cutting-edge software solutions, personalized educational consulting, and engaging digital content that inspires and connects.

footer.description: Driving innovation through technology, education, and content creation.
footer.copyright: © 2024 Advanced Universal Ventures, LLC. All rights reserved.

saas.title: SaaS Solutions
saas.subtitle: Innovative mobile and web applications designed to enhance health, fitness, and lifestyle
saas.productsDesc: Each application is carefully crafted to address specific needs in health, fitness, and lifestyle management
saas.technologyDesc: Built with modern, scalable technologies for optimal performance
saas.interestedDesc: Let's discuss how our applications can help transform your health, fitness, or lifestyle goals

kevobin.title: Kevobin
kevobin.description: Stay connected and healthy with Kevobin, the simple daily companion designed specifically for seniors. Features a large, easy-to-read interface with daily check-ins, medication reminders, hydration tracking, safety features, activity monitoring, and mindfulness content. Completely private and runs offline.
features: Daily check-in with one-tap "I'm OK" button
Hydration tracking with visual water tracker
Daily health tips and mindfulness content

healthtrack.title: HealthTrack Pro
healthtrack.description: Comprehensive health monitoring application that helps users track vital signs, medications, and wellness metrics. Features include AI-powered health insights, appointment reminders, and integration with healthcare providers.

fitlife.title: FitLife Coach
fitlife.description: Personalized fitness coaching platform with workout plans, nutrition tracking, and progress analytics. Includes social features for community support and motivation.

lifestyle.title: Lifestyle Balance
lifestyle.description: All-in-one lifestyle management tool that helps users balance work, personal life, and wellness. Features include habit tracking, goal setting, and mindfulness exercises.

wellness.title: Wellness Planner
wellness.description: Intelligent wellness planning application that creates personalized schedules for exercise, meals, sleep, and self-care activities based on user preferences and goals.

tennis.title: Tennis & Education Consulting
tennis.subtitle: Expert guidance for student-athletes pursuing NCAA tennis opportunities
tennis.pathDesc1: Navigating the NCAA recruitment process can be complex and overwhelming. Our consulting services provide student-athletes and their families with expert guidance to successfully navigate the path to collegiate tennis.
tennis.pathDesc2: We understand the unique challenges of balancing academic excellence with athletic performance, and we're here to help you achieve both goals while finding the right college fit.
tennis.servicesDesc: Comprehensive support throughout your NCAA journey
tennis.whyChooseUsDesc: What sets our consulting services apart
tennis.processDesc: A structured approach to your success
tennis.ready: Ready to Start Your NCAA Journey?
tennis.readyDesc: Let's work together to make your collegiate tennis dreams a reality

eligibility.title: NCAA Eligibility Assessment
eligibility.description: Comprehensive evaluation of your academic and athletic profile to determine NCAA eligibility status and identify areas for improvement.

recruitment.title: Recruitment Strategy
recruitment.description: Personalized recruitment plan tailored to your skill level, academic achievements, and college preferences.

academic.title: Academic Planning
academic.description: Strategic academic planning to ensure you meet all NCAA requirements while maintaining strong performance.

application.title: Application Support
application.description: End-to-end support throughout the college application and recruitment process.

benefits: Expert knowledge of NCAA regulations and requirements
Personalized approach tailored to each student-athlete
Proven track record of successful placements
Comprehensive support from assessment to enrollment
Strong network of college coaches and programs
Focus on both athletic and academic excellence

step1.title: Initial Assessment
step1.desc: Evaluate your current status and goals

content.title: Content Creation
content.subtitle: Social Media Content by Hanyu (Mason) Liu
content.subtitle2: Creating engaging, authentic content that connects with audiences worldwide
content.aboutDesc1: As a passionate content creator, Hanyu (Mason) Liu brings a unique perspective to social media, combining personal experiences with valuable insights across lifestyle, fitness, education, and entertainment.
content.aboutDesc2: With a commitment to authenticity and quality, the content focuses on building genuine connections with audiences while sharing knowledge, inspiration, and engaging stories that resonate with viewers.
content.aboutDesc3: Through consistent, high-quality content across multiple platforms, the goal is to inspire, educate, and entertain while building a community of engaged followers.
content.creator: Content Creator
content.creatorTagline: Creating content that matters, one post at a time
content.platformsDesc: Engaging audiences across multiple social media platforms
content.contentFocusDesc: Diverse content that engages and inspires
content.contentImpactDesc: Building a community through authentic engagement
content.followJourneyDesc: Join the community and stay connected with the latest content and updates

instagram.name: Instagram
instagram.description: Engaging visual content including photos, reels, and stories that connect with audiences through lifestyle, fitness, and personal insights.

youtube.name: YouTube
youtube.description: Long-form video content including vlogs, tutorials, and lifestyle content that provides value and entertainment to subscribers.

tiktok.name: TikTok
tiktok.description: Short-form creative videos that capture attention, showcase personality, and engage with trending topics and challenges.

xiaohongshu.name: Xiaohongshu (Red Note)
xiaohongshu.description: 小红书 - Lifestyle and fashion content sharing platform popular in China, featuring product reviews, travel guides, and lifestyle inspiration.

bilibili.name: Bilibili
bilibili.description: 哔哩哔哩 - Leading video sharing platform in China, featuring anime, gaming, lifestyle vlogs, and educational content for a young, engaged audience.

lifestyle.title: Lifestyle Content
lifestyle.description: Authentic glimpses into daily life, routines, and personal experiences that resonate with viewers.

fitness.title: Fitness & Health
fitness.description: Workout routines, nutrition tips, and wellness advice to inspire and educate the community.

educational.title: Educational Content
educational.description: Valuable insights, tutorials, and knowledge sharing across various topics of interest.

joinUs.title: Join Our Team
joinUs.subtitle: Be part of an innovative team shaping the future of technology, education, and content creation
joinUs.whyJoinDesc: We're building something special, and we want you to be part of it
joinUs.cultureDesc1: At Advanced Universal Ventures, we believe in fostering an environment where innovation thrives, diversity is celebrated, and every team member can make a meaningful impact.
joinUs.cultureDesc2: We value collaboration, continuous learning, and a growth mindset. Our team members are encouraged to bring their unique perspectives, take initiative, and contribute to our shared mission of excellence.
joinUs.cultureDesc3: Whether you're passionate about building cutting-edge software, helping students achieve their dreams, or creating compelling content, you'll find a place to grow and excel here.
joinUs.openPositionsDesc: Explore opportunities to join our growing team
joinUs.dontSeeMatchDesc: We're always looking for talented individuals who share our passion and values. Send us your resume and let us know how you'd like to contribute!
joinUs.readyImpactDesc: Join us in building innovative solutions and creating meaningful experiences

compensation.title: Competitive Compensation
compensation.description: Fair and competitive salary packages with performance incentives

collaborative.title: Collaborative Environment
collaborative.description: Work with a diverse, talented team in a supportive atmosphere

growth.title: Growth Opportunities
growth.description: Professional development and career advancement pathways

flexible.title: Flexible Work
flexible.description: Remote and hybrid work options to fit your lifestyle

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.desc: Striving for the highest standards in everything we do

impact.title: Impact
impact.desc: Making a positive difference in people's lives

developer.title: Software Developer
developer.description: Build innovative mobile and web applications in health, fitness, and lifestyle domains.
requirements: Experience with React Native, Next.js, or similar frameworks
Strong problem-solving skills
Passion for creating user-friendly applications
Knowledge of modern development practices

consultant.title: Tennis Education Consultant
consultant.description: Guide student-athletes through the NCAA recruitment process and academic planning.
requirements: Deep understanding of NCAA regulations
Experience in college athletics or education
Excellent communication and mentoring skills
Passion for helping student-athletes succeed

writer.title: Social Media Content Writer
writer.description: Plan and write engaging content scripts for short-form and long-form social media videos.
requirements: Strong writing and storytelling skills for video content
Understanding of social media trends and audience engagement
Ability to translate business goals into creative content ideas
Comfort collaborating with video editors and on-camera talent

editor.title: Video Editor
editor.description: Edit and refine video content for TikTok, Instagram Reels, YouTube, and other platforms.
requirements: Experience with video editing tools (e.g., CapCut, Premiere Pro, Final Cut, or similar)
Sense of pacing, music, and visual storytelling for social platforms
Ability to optimize content for different formats and aspect ratios
Attention to detail and ability to work with feedback quickly

manager.title: Social Media Business Manager
manager.description: Build partnerships with brands, events, and organizations for collaborations and sponsorships.
requirements: Experience in business development, partnerships, or influencer marketing
Strong networking and relationship-building skills
Comfort reaching out to businesses, events, and agencies
Ability to negotiate win-win collaboration agreements

operations.title: Social Media Operations
operations.description: Operate and manage our social media accounts day-to-day across multiple platforms.
requirements: Hands-on experience managing social media accounts
Ability to schedule posts, respond to comments, and monitor community feedback
Familiarity with analytics and performance tracking tools
Highly organized with strong attention to detail

support.subtitle: Your privacy and security are our top priorities
